Jean Coutu says farewell after shareholders approve sale to Metro</title><description>Jean Coutu fought back tears as he bid adieu to shareholders Wednesday after they approved the sale of the panels, rooftop gardens on Candiac housing development will pay for themselves: developer</title><description>In what&#8217;s being called the first project of its kind in Quebec, a new housing development in Candiac is being equipped with rooftop gardens and solar panels that, the developer says, will generate a profit for residents. The project consists of 148 new townhouses. Half of them will have rooftop solar panels, the other half [&#8230;]</description><source>Business</source><pubDate>Wed, 29 Nov 2017 22:52:57 Z</pubDate><enclosure
